update report_store set model_id=#{modelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_config_id=#{modelConfigId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tj=#{tj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zb=#{zb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rq=#{rq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name=#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cxtj=#{cxtj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak1=#{bak1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak2=#{bak2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak3=#{bak3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak4=#{bak4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak5=#{bak5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak6=#{bak6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user=#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id=#{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date=#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date=#{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user=#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks=#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_status=#{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, json=#{json,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select id, model_id, model_config_id, tj, zb, rq, user_name, user_id, cxtj, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, bak5, bak6, create_user, create_user_id, create_date, status, update_date, update_user, remarks, audit_status, json from report_store where 1=1
and id like '%${id}%'
and model_id like '%${modelId}%'
and model_config_id like '%${modelConfigId}%'
and tj like '%${tj}%'
and zb like '%${zb}%'
and rq like '%${rq}%'
and user_name like '%${userName}%'
and user_id like '%${userId}%'
and cxtj like '%${cxtj}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
and bak5 like '%${bak5}%'
and bak6 like '%${bak6}%'
and create_user like '%${createUser}%'
and create_user_id like '%${createUserId}%'
and create_date like '%${createDate}%'
and status like '%${status}%'
and update_date like '%${updateDate}%'
and update_user like '%${updateUser}%'
and remarks like '%${remarks}%'
and audit_status like '%${auditStatus}%'
and json like '%${json}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
